Package simulator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrailleCell
    Model that holds the states of all eight pins on one braille cell.
    BrailleCellView
    This class is the JPanel for a single braille cell presented on the screen.
    MainView
    MainView sets up the entire simulator interface and ties all components together.
    MainViewController
    This controller can be used to control any aspect of the simulator.
    Settings
    Settings class defines default settings for the simulator.
    SimulatorActionListenerExample
    EXAMPLE CLASS This is an example of how you would listen to action events in your player app.
    SimulatorInitializationExample
    EXAMPLE CLASS This class shows you how you would implement and initialize the simulator.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BrailleConvert
    Enum that maps characters to braille.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BrailleCellStateException
    Exception should be thrown when there is an issue with setting or getting a braille cell state.
    SimulatorInitializationException
    Exception that should be thrown when there are issues with the simulators' initialization.
